description: Try our easy to follow Lamb, Pine Nut & Cheese Piadina recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Flatbread,Seafood free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Mince,Sandwich press,Tomato,Spinach
name: Lamb, Pine Nut & Cheese Piadina Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs of oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook, stirring frequently, for 10 minutes or until light golden. Add garlic and thyme and stir for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add lamb and cook, stirring to break up lumps, for 5 minutes or until browned. Stir in tomato and pine nuts. Remove from heat.

Preheat a clean frying pan or sandwich press. Top one half of bread with lamb mixture. Sprinkle evenly with cheeses. Fold bread to cover filling. Cook in pan or sandwich press for 4-5 minutes or until golden and cheese has melted.

Meanwhile, steam or microwave beans until tender. Drain. Refresh under cold water. Drain. Combine beans, spinach and basil in a serving bowl. Drizzle with remaining oil and toss to coat. Season. Serve piadina with salad.
